website_summaries.verdict: A simple yet classic design that keeps your firewood in place and looks great.
pros: This firewood rack is the perfect size for the average home
It's large enough to store a winter's worth of firewood, but the iron frame is strong enough to keep the wood in place all year long
cons: The only complaint of this rack is from those who need a higher capacity for their wood

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well made and easy to assemble. This is the second one I’ve bought. I got the first one several years ago and it still looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Z

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research on racks to buy since I've never done so before and it's for my first house. Long story short, I was so happy with the first one that I bought a second (to fully accommodate a 1/2 cord of wood). It is fairly easy to put together (took me ~ 30 minutes each, but for anyone reasonably competent it'd take maybe 10-15 minutes). Super sturdy, the cover is great, they look good, and get the job done. Seems like a product that will last forever based on the quality, which is hard to find. Ended up spending $300+ for two of these but am happy I didn't go for a cheap option.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson P.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Solid Log Rack
customer_reviews.text: Very solid. This rack looks great right outside our side door. I never thought I would say that a Log Rack was attractive but this one is and makes storing the wood very secure. A rack that should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but worth it. Sturdy, solid, attractive, and well worth the money. I like the partial cover -- keeps the rain off, and allows the wood to season. If you have two 7/16" wrenches ready to go, one of them a socket, assembly will take about 10 minutes. Add 30 minutes if you use the cheapo throwaway wrenches in the box. Oh, and make very sure it's EXACTLY where you want it, before you load it up. I need to move one end about two inches, but it won't budge until I unload that wood.
customer_reviews.author: NomDePlume

customer_reviews.title: The best firewood racks I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth and final set of firewood racks. The first rack was a super cheap plastic thing from Wal-mart, the second a not so cheap Wal-mart rack, the last way overpriced and rotted (you had to supply your own 2x4 for bottom supports). These are the real deal. This is my second year with them and I just pulled them out of the shed in Florida. Zero rust. Look brand new. Solid and sturdy and holds oak stacks 5' tall. Buy it for life!
customer_reviews.author: Greg in Longwood

customer_reviews.title: High quality rack
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very easy to assemble. Glad I spent the extra coin for a high quality rack. Photo below is the rack with a 1/4 cord (32 cu^ft) of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Log Rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great firewood rack and a good value for the price. It easily holds fireplace-size logs and is very sturdy. The cover slides down the posts so that the top layer of wood is protected from rain and snow. I could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: cactus flower

customer_reviews.title: STURDY! 20 minutes to put together
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was very straightforward, if you have or can borrow some tools. The bolts were an extremely tight fit, requiring a few taps with a hammer to send home. I also found the two tiny stamped metal wrenches provided to be inadequate and used 2 socket wrenches instead. It seems very sturdy and has many thoughtful details in its design. The cover "floats" with the height of the stack, so that the wood is protected from rain but can also continue to cure with good air circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product has had it over two months now easy to put together sturdy frame bought from the same company the cover that would completely cover it instead of the one that came with the log rack that just covers the top logs due to us having dogs so we didn’t have any problems with them peeing on the lower stored wood lol.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret O'Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a little while now and so far so good. Just don't leave your axe on top in the rain or it will rust the cover. Otherwise, it survived a wet, Portland winter without rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Jen D

customer_reviews.title: 5 ft Woodhaven Firewood rack
customer_reviews.text: This rack was very easy to put together, I completed it by myself. Very well made, thanks for being made in the U.S.A. When my firewood was delivered the owner of the company stated it was one of the best firewood racks he had ever seen. Holds my 1/4 cord of wood off the ground and the cover fits perfectly, keeps the rain off. This is a great buy and looks like it will last for a long time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: trdnface

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Firewood Rack
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an extra rack to hold an extra stash of firewood. Very sturdy construction and easy to put together. Has held up well and stores about 1/4 cord of wood. The cover is great and prevents the top 1/3 of wood from getting wet. It can be easily blown off with a gust of wind so I would recommend putting a weighted object on top. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I usually dont like to waste my time to review but I was so impressed with this firewood rack. Pay a little extra to have quality, don't waste your money on tubular racks. I bought one last year and I just bought one again this year. I just love it
customer_reviews.author: Esther B.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but less than 1/2 cord
customer_reviews.text: Per the discretion, this will NOT hold a 1/2 cord. I stacked the wood tight and piled it up to a peak over the top and still had a big wheel barrow full. Not an issue, because the size is exactly what I needed. Feels very rigid after filling with wood, I was a little concerned given the metal seemed wimpy at first. Getting the bolts on wasn’t as easy as it could have been, even with my own wrenches.
customer_reviews.author: Staci M Quashnock

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: you need to have 7/16 wrench, preferably a rachet, as the holes are a little small for the bolts. It would be easier to assemble if the bolts just slid through rather than having to use a wrench. Good product though, as we have another one I purchased in 2011 and it is still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P

customer_reviews.title: Great quality wood rack
customer_reviews.text: Woodhaven makes great quality racks. I have two 5 foot models and one 12 foot rack in various places around my home/yard. They hold up very well and have nice covers. I put them on blocks to get them a little higher off the ground, but they are perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Parabellum

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Good quality and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We just spent the whole afternoon cutting down some of the smaller trees that fell in our yard from last weeks wind storm. This thing came just in time and is already full up. Its extremely sturdy and well worth the price. The cover seems really durable and will hopefully last longer then the cheaper tarps we have used in the past. My only regret, was not buying two!!! as we still have a ton of wood that needs to be stacked.
customer_reviews.author: ItsJustMe

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, and is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks good,and is very sturdy.The steel is heavy as it should be in a high quality rack like this. It is a bit expensive,but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: J.I

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Assembled fairly easily. Cover fits well, although it has elastic to hold it in place. Most likely will only last a season or two before it looses the tightness. Seems worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: bcrow

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-made product
customer_reviews.text: Product is high quality and easy to assemble. I bought 1 and then bought another because it was so well made.
customer_reviews.author: JL Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great to hold wood
customer_reviews.text: Works great to hold wood, but if you have the rack very full, the cover comes off easily if it's real windy out. If the rack isn't more than half full, the cover stays on perfectly, even in high winds, though, so I can't totally hate it. Keeps the wood off the ground and away from the shed.
customer_reviews.author: laffitupfzbl

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and so nice looking in my backyard
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and so nice looking in my backyard. I had it filled to the top! The only problem is that one of the the 4 elastic loops ripped pretty much after first use but the other 3 are still in tack so you can't see it. I would have given 5 stars if that loop didn't rip. Everybody loves this firewood rack!
customer_reviews.author: D.Herr

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace an old firewood rack. The hardware is sturdy and the cover is good quality. The cover is actually awesome, just saying, this feature is perfect, no tarp to deal with. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Simple sturdy and effective product
customer_reviews.text: First wood rack I’ve bought so I have nothing to compare this to. I will say 8 bolts to assemble. Easier if you use a socket and wrench set. Simple but effective design. Sturdy but light. Cover appears to be heavy material that won’t wear out quickly and hangs tight to the rack. Couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: Scott Shea

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack and Cover
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and love the cover. Hopefully it will hold up. Packaging was good. Assembly was fine but a bit awkward alone. Another set of hands would have helped but I put it together alone in garage at 3am. Being retired rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: get this one, dont buy cheap!!
customer_reviews.text: this is my second one of these, the first one I still have on my patio and the new one I put back near our firepit. i did notice they upgraded the cover with some nice elastic straps to strap onto the poles to keep the cover from moving, NICE Addition!!! also really easy to assemble and quality is great. my other one I've probably had is around 6 years old and still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Fit great for my patio.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on my patio between two windows. Holds a lot of wood. This replace a round one. I later got an offer from Amazon for $72.00 for a full cover that was not offered with this rack. Should have been an option when I purchase this rack. Received 1.3 inches of rain this week and top several rows stayed dryed with cover that comes with the rack. Took about twenty minutes to but together with a rachet and wrench. Some black paint came off the bolts and nuts. A lot of money for the rack but well built.
customer_reviews.author: R. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I added this to hold additional wood at my cabin. Nicely built, strong and stable. A welcome addition
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hegerty

customer_reviews.title: Keeping firewood close and dry
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble firewood rack and heavy metal makes it sturdy. The heavyweight half-cover keeps the top rows dry and very accessible. Rack is on the back porch; appealing enough to have close to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece! I wanted something with a simple design and large enough to hold a lot. Reviews on this were good so I ordered it. This is perfect and worth the money. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Very strong rack.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the rack. The assembly went well. The rack is very strong/sturdy. It holds a 1/4 cord nicely with room for the cover to go on. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rice

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Sturdy. The black tarp goes on nicely. I just wish it stretched tightly instead of bowing in the middle slightly. It creates a small area for water to pool. But this is a minor complaint. It looks very good and makes wood storage look very organized, stacked nicely, keeps it off the floor & it is aesthetically a beautiful way to store/display wood.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect firewood rack!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great firewood rack. Have it up next to my house for the winter months. Rest of the wood is out back by my shed. Held enough to last all winter with some left over. Will fill it again next fall!!!
customer_reviews.author: smanigal

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This rack is built strong and has no trouble holding anything you put on it. It looks sharp and modern and fits well against my deck. The adjustable rain cover keeps my fire pit tools and firewood dry.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Sordyl

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! Well made! The cover stay on great as well. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Micsmw78

customer_reviews.title: Good rack
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered a second one! My husband really likes the way the top slides up and down to keep the top of the wood stack dry. There's no mold on the rest of the wood because air can ciculate. The top is a sturdy vinyl and the stand itself is also sturdy. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa in Ellijay

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Sturdy, ample capacity and holds up well! Going to order a second one!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Makes our backyard fire pit area look neat and comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: This looks great out by our fire pit!! I love the wood is stacked neatly. Holds quite a bit also. I did purchase a larger cover so that ALL of the logs are covered. So far it has withstood a lot of rain and fairly high winds. Overall, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. Sturdily built, holds almost 1/2 cord of wood and the cover keeps the wood dry.
customer_reviews.author: Fran DuVall

customer_reviews.title: however with that said it is VERY sturdy. A quality product and it comes with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was more expensive than the other log racks that I looked at; however with that said it is VERY sturdy. A quality product and it comes with a cover that feels like it will stand up to several years worth of use. It was very easy to put together. I believe that you get what you pay for and this is worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: WRW

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and finish.
customer_reviews.text: The materials are good quality and the finish seems adequate for this to last several year with direct weather exposure. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

customer_reviews.title: but great quality. The cover works great and doesn't blow ...
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap, but great quality. The cover works great and doesn't blow off in the wind. I have this in the 5' model and another rack in 8 ft. I wish I had ordered this one first.
customer_reviews.author: Robi Owens

customer_reviews.title: Buy this and you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The Woodhaven is sturdy and classy. Much better than the log racks made of round tube stock. I have this in a sheltered area on my porch, so do not use the top cover.
customer_reviews.author: J-F

customer_reviews.title: Looks like new. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this rack for maybe 2-ish years now. Looks like new. Sturdy. Top cover excellent, not faded or torn. I'm going to buy another one (8 foot with a full cover) for the patio fire pit now.
customer_reviews.author: JWH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well built, nice cover
customer_reviews.text: And made in the U.S.A. Don’t hesitate to buy. I only bought the 5’ ones due to my own space constraints. The longer ones are a better value.
customer_reviews.author: C Criddle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful firewood rack
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this rack to store our firewood for our firepit. It is simple to assemble and looks very beautiful. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, keeps the firewood up and better organized!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid log rack with excellent cover
customer_reviews.text: This assembled easily with two wrenches. The cover is sturdy and looks like it will last a long time. I did as recommended and put all four legs on pavers, rather than directly on the ground. I split wood and filled it up and it is exactly what I was looking for. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bicyclegirl

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY
customer_reviews.text: This rack is heavy and sturdy but is easier to assemble with two people. I would like it better if the cover was a little longer with better coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to construct and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: While we considered some more decorative, half moon shaped holders, we decided on a more utilitarian model (it IS just to hold wood). This was easy to put together, is sturdy, doesn't take up much room, and holds a good amount. The cover is an added bonus as many others make you buy separately.
customer_reviews.author: Bhammulch

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Buy this one. Industrial grade. Does not wobble. USA - not junk from you know where.
customer_reviews.author: KMAC

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great Product that fits nicely on our front porch....but we got a puppy and he shredded the cover!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Holds up nicely
customer_reviews.text: One of the things I like about Amazon is that I can see exactly when I bought something just by going to the product page. I have now had this rack for a little over two years, and I still love it, and it is holding up well. Sometimes, you get what you pay for, and this is one of them. I highly recommend this sturdy rack.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! We'll see how many winters it lasts
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We'll see how many winters it lasts. Love how heavy duty it is so far and love the cover
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Reese

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: very very nice. I was considering buying a cheaper one but since this will be outdoors - I thought I should invest in a better one. This thing is awesome - so far, no rust or any noticeable change after a harsh winter. My friends' who bought the cheaper ones all want one of these now. worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NYUDoc04

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wood rack for indoors to hold half a rick this fits the bill. It looks nice is very strong holds up under pressure and the top tarp gives a very clean look.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Elegant wood rack!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect birthday gift for my husband. Easy to assemble - and looks like a million bucks - simple elegance on our new quartzite patio!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I joked with our camping neighbors that this rack and cover puts theirs to shame (they were always teasing me about having a tiny log rack). This one makes a statement of size, sturdiness and class as the cover is beautiful and thick too. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Huelsman

customer_reviews.title: Very quick and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy, quite a value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Log Storage Par Excellence
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made log rack. Assembled easily and works great. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly. Easy to assemble. Makes our firewood like neat behind our garage. Seems to be very sturdy. We are pleased with our purchase, especially since it was made in the USA. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Pie

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing a moderate amount of wood and keeping it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good quality steel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a house warming gift, and it is a very sturdy rack! The steel is powder coated and holds an ample amound of wood without any signs of buckling.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Good rack for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Well built, solid rack which is easy to put together and looks okay. Nothing special to look at, but doesn't look cheap or flimsy in any way either. I very much like the quality of this.
customer_reviews.author: Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Cover has ripped.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product did not meet my expectations. The rack itself is quite sturdy, but the cover ripped in the first month. For the money there are better options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: After removing it from the box, it was easy to assemble. Each piece is heavy and sturdy, as we'll as the bolts to attach it all together. Filled it with wood works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: This wood rack is very sturdy & the cover is great for keeping wood dry.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Simple materials and fabrication is costly.
customer_reviews.text: Basic construction of steel tubular sections and minimal welds is costly. The vertical supports should have additional cross members for sturdier support. Should add art appeal to vertical supports.
customer_reviews.author: David in NM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality firewood rack!
customer_reviews.text: This firewood rack is very sturdy, attractive and holds wood firmly. I've had it for about six months and it is holding up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole King

customer_reviews.title: strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: this rack is awesome - very strong and sturdy, not a hint of bend or sway in the frame and I've got it loaded about as full as you can get it. The cover is nice for keeping the logs dry at the top of the stack, or just for a neater look - ours is located on a sheltered patio and we still use the cover. The rack keeps the wood up off the ground and helps to keep out bugs and moisture.
customer_reviews.author: BaldNomad

customer_reviews.title: Hey you gotta nice Rack
customer_reviews.text: Best rack I have owned. Every other rack fell apart after the first year. I can tell this one will last. Even the cover is well made and will last. I like that I can lower the cover as I use wood and it keeps the pile fairly dry. Great product. Even my firewood guy said it was the best he has seen
customer_reviews.author: MBAR

customer_reviews.title: Pure Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Very sturdy. Great, easy to secure cover - exactly what I wanted/needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: Quality good for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Seems pretty sturdy. The included "wrench" was pitiful. I used my own tools. I am not sure I could have assembled it with the included wrench alone. They could just leave it out.
customer_reviews.author: Alsal

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Sturdy. Top quality. Doesn't have any wobble or shakiness. Stands firm. And they have a smart way to secure the cover so it stays on in high wind but doesn't impede you from quickly grabbing logs.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy !
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional buy ! Has held up very well for the past year. Wonderful design and very roomy. Very reasonably priced compared to others I have seen,
customer_reviews.author: LA Becky

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store firewood in our garage and to save space. I have been using it for several weeks now and really like it. It is sturdy and well constructed. It was easy to put together and holds quite a bit of firewood.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: American made - great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to assemble and smart design with the cover over the top logs. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: John White

customer_reviews.title: This is a great 1/4th cord firerack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great 1/4th cord firerack. Sturdy, was easy to put together. I will definitely be ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: tjc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but best to use your own wrenches. Seems durable and keeps the wood piled up nicely. Top cover protects from wet weather and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Quinnched

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a month now. It’s sturdy and the cover that comes with it is durable. Seems built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Wife was thrilled with looks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and love the cover with flap. Adds to the look of patio !
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this log rack. Assembly was straight-forward, although took longer than expected to align holes and get nuts to spin on freely. It looks great and it the nicest one I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack because of other people's reviews. All were correct on their assessment of the rack. It has a very durable coating over the steel. Went together in minutes, and is now holding my firewood. Glad I spent the extra money on this one because it looks nice next to my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa S.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made. It was also very easy to assemble. It came with it's own tools, but I used a socket wrench to speed the assembly along.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and you can load it to the top with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the king of all firewood racks. Drop dead simple to assemble, heavy yet attractive. The cover is a huge plus. Sturdy and you can load it to the top with hardwood with ease. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Wine Lover

customer_reviews.title: Quality Construction
customer_reviews.text: We put this together this weekend and we were so impressed with the quality of construction. It was very easy to put together and the cover to put over the top of the logs is a really nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Chesnut

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Log Rack!
customer_reviews.text: I figured I wouldn't mess around so I bought the best log rack out there. Not disappointed at all. Little pricey but it does the trick and rather pay a little extra rather than through good money after bad for a cheaper rack. Highly recommend. The wood is happy and so am I!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Aston

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy split-wood rack.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Easily put together with a ratchet wrench and the provided tool. Assembly took around 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Declein

customer_reviews.title: Great log rack. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. Very sturdy and well made. Perfect to keep wood on the deck for those bad weather days when you don't want to trudge out into bad weather to the wood pile.
customer_reviews.author: irish maiden

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, extremely sturdy and love thay it comes with a cover.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Better than the others.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, heavy duty, easy to assemble. Love the cover.
customer_reviews.author: rfogarasi

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Went together quickly. Seems quite sturdy. Cover works well. It's fairly new so I can't say how it holds up over time, but so far I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Paul

customer_reviews.title: Stand behind their product!
customer_reviews.text: Original package didn't have all hardware required to complete assembly, But the manufacturer very quickly provide a complete set of additional hardware and a complimentary fire starter. Great product and terrific customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley N Lichtenstein

customer_reviews.title: Great for stacking your wood.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it. He'd already bought the larger 8 foot size , and he wanted to add this one too. Same fine sturdy quality. And a lovely tidy yard !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together--just have someone hold up the other end for getting it started. We are very pleased. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality and just fit into the space we made for it, measurements were right on.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Shulman

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made, which is rare these days. Nice clean look to stacked wood.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Put Together
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift. The recipient loved it. It's very sturdy and easy to put together. Very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and stable
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and stable; the cover looks like it will last in the weather for a long time; was able to assemble it in quick order.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this rack for about 6 months and have a fire everyday, it is very sturdy and was easy to set up.
